statements: SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM project_milestones WHERE timeline_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, project_id FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 5 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, project_id FROM project_milestones WHERE timeline_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND milestone_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT milestone_name, project_id, milestone_date FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY project_id ASC, milestone_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_description FROM project_milestones;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_timelines ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM project_timelines;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones ORDER BY milestone_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_description FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 100 ORDER BY milestone_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(DISTINCT milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM project_timelines GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_milestones > 3;

SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, project_id FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 500 AND milestone_id IN (SELECT milestone_id FROM project_timelines WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31');

SELECT project_id, milestone_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines INNER JOIN project_milestones ON project_timelines.milestone_id = project_milestones.milestone_id ORDER BY start_date ASC, milestone_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones;
SELECT name, status FROM project_milestones WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timeline_date, current_progress FROM project_timelines ORDER BY timeline_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM project_teams WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT id, description, status FROM project_milestones WHERE name LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, name, description, status FROM project_milestones;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS team_count FROM project_teams GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_timelines WHERE current_progress > 50 ORDER BY timeline_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, project_milestones.name AS project_name FROM project_teams JOIN project_milestones ON project_teams.project_id = project_milestones.id;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(DISTINCT team_lead) AS unique_leads FROM project_teams GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM project_team WHERE team_name LIKE 'Dev%';
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, AVG(progress_status) AS avg_progress FROM project_progress GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_team WHERE team_name LIKE '%Development%';
SELECT * FROM project_milestones;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = '12345';
SELECT project_id, MAX(due_date) AS latest_due_date FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(milestone_id) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_milestones DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, progress_percentage FROM project_milestones JOIN milestone_progress ON project_milestones.milestone_id = milestone_progress.milestone_id;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_milestones DESC;
SELECT project_id, status, current_progress FROM project_status WHERE current_progress > 50;
SELECT project_id, user_id, role FROM project_team WHERE project_id = '456e89b7-12d3-a456-4266-155440000';
